titleStmt.title: Sǝnkǝssār for the second half of the year

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msItem.title: Sǝnkǝssār for the first half of the year
1 Maggābit
Commemoration entry for Barkisos, bishop of Jerusalem
Commemoration entry for ʾƎskǝndǝr, bishop of Qapadoqǝyā
Commemoration entry for ʾabbā Marqoryos the martyr and for the death of Mātusālā the patriarch
2 Maggābit
Commemoration entry for ʾabbā Makrāwi the bishop of ʾƎsmunzurāyǝs
Commemoration entry for Gorgoryos, the seer of things hidden, of the city of Rohā
3 Maggābit
Commemoration entry for ʾabbā Qozmos, patriarch of Alexandria
Commemoration entry for Barfonyos of the city of Fānyos
4 Maggābit
Commemoration entry for the synod assembled in the city of the children of ʾAmar
Commemoration entry for Hanǝlyos the governor
5 Maggābit
Commemoration entry for ʾabbā Sarābǝmon, abbot of the monastery of Saint ʾabbā John of the desert of Scete
Commemoration entry for ʾOdokiyā the martyr
Salutation to Gabra Manfas Qǝddus
6 Maggābit
Commemoration entry for Diyosqoros the martyr from Alexandria
Commemoration entry for Tewodoṭos the Confessor, bishop of Qorotos
Commemoration entry for ʾƎnṭonǝs and ʾArkāladis the hermits
7 Maggābit
Commemoration entry for Filmon and ʾAblānyos the martyrs
Commemoration entry for Tewodoṭos the martyr from Galātyā
8 Maggābit
Commemoration entry for ʾAryānos, the governor of ʾAndenāw
Salutation to the four Galatians who perished with Arianus
Commemoration entry for Matthias the apostle
Commemoration entry for ʾabbā Yulyānos the patriarch of Alexandria
Salutation to the Seven Sleepers
9 Maggābit
Commemoration entry for ʾAndǝyānos, his wife, ʾAwsābyos, ʾArmā, and forty martyrs
Commemoration entry for the 20,000 martyrs who were with ʾabbā Nob
Commemoration entry for the ascetic Kutǝn
10 Maggābit
Commemoration entry for the invention of the Holy Cross
Commemoration entry for ʾAwsānyos and other martyrs
11 Maggābit
Commemoration entry for Tewoṭeqinos
Commemoration entry for Bāsilāʾos, bishop and martyr
Commemoration entry for ʾAlef, one of the Nine Saints
Commemoration entry for ʾAwsānyos, ʾEfrem, ʾArqādyu, and ʾElyās
12 Maggābit
Commemoration entry for St Michael the archangel
Commemoration entry for the manifestation of the virginity of St Dǝmeṭrǝyos, patriarch of Alexandria
Commemoration entry for Malāzi of the country of Fǝlsǝṭʾem
Salutation to Joseph
13 Maggābit
Commemoration entry for the forty soldiers of Sǝbǝsṭǝyā
Commemoration entry for persecution of Maqāryos the Great and of Maqāryos the Alexandrian
Commemoration entry for ʾabbā Diyonāsyos patriarch of Alexandria
14 Maggābit
Commemoration entry for Qerǝllos, patriarch of Alexandria
Commemoration entry for ʾabbā Batǝl the monk
Commemoration entry for ʾabbā Sinodā the martyr
Commemoration entry for ʾAwgānyos, ʾAwgānudros, and ʾAlibidyos the martyrs
Commemoration entry for the miracle worked by Thomas the apostle
15 Maggābit
Commemoration entry for Sārā the nun
Commemoration entry for Solafkos, the bridegroom of the holy woman ʾAsṭarāṭoniqā
Commemoration entry for ʾabbā Hǝlyānos of ʾƎhnās
16 Maggābit
Commemoration entry for ʾabbā Mikāʾel, patriarch of Alexandria
17 Maggābit
Commemoration entry for ʾAlʿāzār, whom Our Lord raised from the grave
Commemoration entry for Tewoqriṭos the reader
Commemoration entry for Giyorgis the fighter, Talāsyos the martyr, Yosef the bishop, and the translation of the body of Nikor the high priest
Salutation to Giyorgis, Talāsyos, and Yosef the bishop
18 Maggābit
Commemoration entry for ʾIsǝdǝros, the companion of Ḍānā the martyr
Salutation to ʾabbā Garimā
Commemoration entry for Wǝslǝyos the martyr and the translation of the body of Nikor
19 Maggābit
Commemoration entry for ʾArǝsṭuṗāwlos the preacher and apostle
Commemoration entry for the seven martyrs from Qisāryā
Commemoration entry for ʾAskanāfǝr, his wife Mārtā, and his sons ʾArqādyos and Yoḥannǝs
20 Maggābit
Commemoration entry for ʾabbā Mikāʾel patriarch of Alexandria
Commemoration entry for the day Our Lord raised the righteous man ʾAlʿāzār from the dead

Commemoration entry for ʾAsṭarāṭāniqā the martyr
Salutation to ʾAsṭarāṭāniqā and the six thousand one hundred and eighty-five men who were martyred with her
Commemoration entry for the consecration of the church of St ʾabbā ʾAsqarān
21 Maggābit
Commemoration entry for the feast of Our Lady Mary
Commemoration entry for the day in which Our Lord Jesus Christ came with his disciples to Bitānyā
Commemoration entry for the council in which the high priests decided to kill ʾAlʿāzār
Commemoration entry for Lāmeḫ the son of Mātusālā
Commemoration entry for the martyrs Tewodros and Ṭimotewos
22 Maggābit
Commemoration entry for the day in which Our Lord Jesus Christ came into Jerusalem (Palm Sunday)
Commemoration entry for Qerǝllos, bishop of Jerusalem
23 Maggābit
Commemoration entry for Daniel the prophet
Commemoration entry for the council of the Jews in the house of Caiaphas
24 Maggābit
Commemoration entry for ʾabbā Maqārǝs, patriarch of Alexandria
Commemoration entry for the council of the Jews in which they plotted against our Lord
25 Maggābit
Commemoration entry for ʾOnisifores the apostle

Commemoration entry for ʾƎḫta Krǝstos of the monastery of Dabra Sinā at the time of Ṣǝge Hāymānot

Commemoration entry for Fǝrfǝyos
Commemoration entry for the Washing of the Feet

Commemoration entry for ʾabbā Maqārǝs the Great

Commemoration entry for the crucifixion of Our Lord Jesus Christ
Commemoration entry for Galāwdewos king of Ethiopia

Commemoration entry for the Annunciation
Commemoration entry for the Resurrection of Our Lord

Commemoration entry for the feast of St Gabriel

Commemoration entry for ʾabbā Sǝlwānos

Commemoration entry for ʾIyoʾaqem, the father of Our Lady Mary

1 Sane
msItem.note: The commemoration entry and the salutation to Yosef the just is missing.

3 Sane
msItem.note: A commemoration entry for Karyon the martyr is included; the salutation to ʾElāryon is missing.

msItem.note: The commemoration entry for ʾAmmon the companion of Minās is missing.

msItem.note: A salutation to Bifāmon and Qozmān from the city of Ṭāḥā is included.

msItem.note: A commemoration entry for the miracles worked by ʾAbaskiron is included.

9 Sane

msItem.note: The commemoration entry for the Yǝsak is replaced by that for Dasak.

msItem.title: 11 Sane

msItem.note: A commemoration entry for the sister of Baṣalota Mikāʾel is included.

msItem.title: 13 Sane
msItem.note: The commemoration entry for Magdalāwit is missing.

msItem.title: 14 Sane
15 Sane

msItem.note: A salutation to Zaʾiyasus Buruk, the companion of king Yǝkunno ʾAmlāk.

msItem.title: 17 Sane
msItem.note: The commemoration entry for ʾƎskǝndǝros is missing.

msItem.title: 18 Sane
msItem.note: An anonymous salutation is included.

msItem.title: 19 Sane
msItem.note: A salutation to Tasfā Mikāʾel is included.

msItem.title: 20 Sane
msItem.note: A salutation to the church of Our Lady Mary is included.

23 Sane
24 Sane
25 Sane
msItem.note: The commemoration entry for Yostinā, the daughter of king Minās, is missing.

msItem.title: 26 Sane
27 Sane
28 Sane
msItem.note: Bifānǝs is called Bifāntǝyos.

msItem.title: 29 Sane
msItem.note: The salutation to ʾabbā Bsoy and the commemoration entry for the translation of the body of ʿAmda Mikāʾel are missing. The space for the salutation to ʾabbā Bsoy has been left unfilled.

msItem.title: 30 Sane
1 Ḥamle
msItem.note: A commemoration entry for Gabra Tomās is added after that on Gabra Madḫǝn

msItem.title: 2 Ḥamle
msItem.note: All commemoration entries are missing after the salutation to Tādewos

msItem.title: 3 Ḥamle
4 Ḥamle
5 Ḥamle
6 Ḥamle
msItem.note: The salutation to ʾAbrǝham the patriarch precedes the commemoration entry for Tewodosyā

msItem.title: 7 Ḥamle
msItem.note: A space before the commemoration entry for ʾAgnāṭyos has been left unfilled. All commemoration entries are missing after the salutation to ʾAgnāṭyos.

msItem.title: 8 Ḥamle
msItem.note: The commemoration entry and the salutation to ʾabbā Misāʾel is missing. The commemoration entry for ʾabbā Ṗāwli is missing. The commemoration entry for the fifteen companions of ʾabbā Nob is found on 9 Ḥamle

msItem.title: 9 Ḥamle
msItem.note: The commemoration entry for Qalāyoṗā and the invocation to Nātnāʾel is missing. The latter is found on 10 Ḥamle.

msItem.title: 10 Ḥamle
11 Ḥamle
12 Ḥamle
13 Ḥamle
msItem.note: The commemoration entry for the consecration of the church of ʾAbsoy and the following invocation are missing.

msItem.title: 14 Ḥamle
msItem.note: The commemoration entry for Fiqṭor is missing.

msItem.title: 15 Ḥamle
msItem.note: The commemoration entry for Jonah the prophet is missing.

msItem.title: 16 Ḥamle
17 Ḥamle
msItem.note: The commemoration entry for ʾabbā ʾƎndǝryās from Dabra Libānos is missing.

msItem.title: 18 Ḥamle
19 Ḥamle
20 Ḥamle
msItem.note: After the salutation to Tewodros the salutations to Teklā and Gabra ʾIyasus are added.

msItem.title: 21 Ḥamle
Commemoration entry for the feast ouf Our Lady Mary
Commemoration entry for Susǝnyos
Salutation to the birth of ʾabuna ʾEwosṭātewos
Commemoration entry for ʾƎḫʷa Krǝstos
Commemoration entry for ʾUrāʾel the archangel
Salutation to Baṣalota Mikāʾel
Salutation to Takla Hāymānot
Salutation to Lāʾǝka Māryām
22 Ḥamle
msItem.note: The commemoration entry for Markǝlos is missing.

msItem.title: 23 Ḥamle
msItem.note: The commemoration entry for ʾAbṭǝlmāwos and Sinodā are missing.

msItem.title: 24 Ḥamle
msItem.note: Another salutation to ʾabbā Nob and to Takla ʾAdonāy are added.

msItem.title: 25 Ḥamle
msItem.note: The salutation to the seventy-seven companions of Teklā, to ʾAṭrābyos are added. The commemoration entry for the martyrs of Athribis, ʾAmon and Māryām, the salutation to the martyrs of Athribis, and to Our Lady Mary have been added.

msItem.title: 26 Ḥamle
27 Ḥamle
msItem.note: A salutation to Jesus Christ is added before the salutation to ʾAmon and Bifamon

msItem.title: 28 Ḥamle
msItem.note: The commemoration entry for Māryām Magdalāwit is missing (it is found on 6 Naḥāse). Another salutation to Masqal Kǝbrā is added.

msItem.title: 29 Ḥamle
30 Ḥamle
msItem.note: The salutation to the church of Suryāl the archangel

msItem.title: 1 Naḥāse
msItem.note: The salutation to the three virgins Ṗisṭis, ʾAlāṗis, and ʾAgāṗis is missing. The commemoration entry for ʾabuna Sǝmʿon of Dāgā is missing.

msItem.title: 2 Naḥāse
3 Naḥāse
4 Naḥāse
5 Naḥāse
6 Naḥāse
msItem.note: The commemoration entry for Māryām Magdalāwit is added.

msItem.title: 7 Naḥāse
8 Naḥāse
msItem.note: The commemoration entry for ʾabuna Yoḥannǝs of Dabra Libānos is added.

msItem.title: 9 Naḥāse
10 Naḥāse
11 Naḥāse
12 Naḥāse
13 Naḥāse
14 Naḥāse
15 Naḥāse
msItem.note: The second salutation to Mārinā is missing.

msItem.title: 16 Naḥāse
msItem.note: Another salutation to Giyorgis is added.

msItem.title: 17 Naḥāse
18 Naḥāse
msItem.note: Erroneously indicated as 17 Naḥāse.

msItem.title: 19 Naḥāse
msItem.note: Erroneously indicated as 18 Naḥāse. A salutation to Yāʿqob is added.

msItem.title: 20 Naḥāse
msItem.note: The salutation to Yāʿqob is missing.

msItem.title: 21 Naḥāse
22 Naḥāse
23 Naḥāse
24 Naḥāse
25 Naḥāse
26 Naḥāse
27 Naḥāse
msItem.note: The salutation to Sāmuʾel is missing.

msItem.title: 28 Naḥāse
29 Naḥāse
30 Naḥāse
1 Ṗāgʷǝmen
2 Ṗāgʷǝmen
msItem.note: The commemoration entry for ʾAdrǝyānos and ʾAnǝṭolyā

msItem.title: 3 Ṗāgʷǝmen
4 Ṗāgʷǝmen
5 Ṗāgʷǝmen
msItem.note: The concluding entry is missing.

signatures.note: Quire marks are written with Ethiopic numerals in the upper inner corner of the first leaf of quires from to , from to , and .

item.q: ይትባረክ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ዘአፈጸመኒ፡ ዘንተ፡ መጽሐፈ፨ በዳኅና፡ ወበሰላም፡ ይቤ፡ ጸሐፊሁ፨

item.desc: Spaces for the name of the owner have been sometimes left unfilled.

projectDesc.p: Encoded according to TEI P5 Guidelines.
